content: As discussed on our call last week, I've shifted the Questionnaire/SDC/PRO call to begin 30 minutes later than usual (so 5:30 Eastern).

Grahame's on holiday's and half of our usual attendees will be missing due to the July 4th holiday. Plus I'm going to be prepping to go to a jamboree. So I'm going to cancel this week's call. (Next week's call will also be cancelled because I'll be away.) Enjoy the summer break :)
